channel.title: Adding NEW player rights and crowns
channel.description: I've looked on google - nothing searched on here - got this crap guide that doesn't work: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363788.0.html Gets very aggravating when people have done it but I can't find a way to do it.. o.O Thanks in advance, if anyone answers..

item.title: Adding NEW player rights and crowns
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

I’m not sure what to add to the server side… :
Sorry if I make this very difficult.
All the guides on here are horrible and don’t work anymore.
I have Tom’s Cache Editor but i’m not sure how far that will get me…

Read full topic

Better? :\

item.title: Adding NEW player rights and crowns
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

Yeh - I was just wondering how I could possibly add it. If you knew a few steps to adding it, it would help out a bunch. And would I add it in mod_Icons.dat?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2009, 08:33:31 pm[/size][hr][quote=“noobspure50, post:16, topic:313461”][code] if (command.startsWith(“add”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yournamehere”)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "donators");

donator = 1;
sM(“You have added “+p.playerName+” to the donator list”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to add to the list…”);
}
}[/code]

try that[/quote]

How would I sync an icon with that?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2009, 08:44:47 pm[/size][hr]EDIT: No, that command didn’t work. Maybe it’s because I already have errors, but it didn’t sM or anything. It did write the log, however. But no names were added to it.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding NEW player rights and crowns

item.title: Adding NEW player rights and crowns
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“add”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yournamehere”)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "donators");

donator = 1;
sM(“You have added “+p.playerName+” to the donator list”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to add to the list…”);
}
}[/code]

try that

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

Well - Someone posted then must have deleted? But they said the line in the “Character files”.
This line

character-donator = 0

If I were to set that to

character-donator = 1

how could I correspond a crown to go with that. Or a money sign, or what have you.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NEW player rights and crowns
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

you could do it a basic way

public int donatorRank = 0;

make a command ::givedonator or w.e

have it do donatorRank += 1;

have your server save donatorRank onto player saving, like pvp point saving for example, then define what you want to happen if it’s a donator
if(donatorRank == 1){
etc.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2009, 08:14:40 pm[/size][hr]who says donator is even defined?

Read full topic
item.source: Adding NEW player rights and crowns

item.title: Adding NEW player rights and crowns
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

Then how do people have donators, mods, admins, owners, players? (maybe hidden?)
And if I can’t then…
Let’s say I change it to

0 - Player 1 - Donator 2 - Moderator 3 - Admin 4 - Owner
Just move everything from “1” down and add Donator. How would I make the donator crown correspond with the power? Add an extra crown in Cache Editor and make it “0”? I’ve failed to find any helpful information. :\

Thanks in advance, sorry if I’m a pain. o.O Just really want to make it happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NEW player rights and crowns
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

[quote=“the1337legend, post:7, topic:313461”][quote author=Phineas link=topic=409962.msg3024965#msg3024965 date=1257861932]
Yep most guides on that are bullshit and aren’t set up properly. My suggestion is just get someone to code that specific thing for you, or get a client that already has it.
[/quote]

ll or maybe you just don’t understand it?

and yes Tom’s Cache works wonders, adding powers, simple… i don’t see how any tuts havn’t solved your issue with powers.[/quote]

You can add/edit IMAGES, but not add player rights.
Such as…

0 = player 1 = donator 2 = moderator 3 = admin 4 = owner 5 = hidden
I just want to add 1 more player right and add a crown for donators and owner. All I currently have is Admin and Moderator.

Read full topic
